titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Kings County Clerk bonds of administration 1986.005
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:19:28 +0000.

did.unittitle: Kings County Clerk bonds of administration

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Kings County (N.Y.). Office of the County Clerk

did.abstract: This collection contains 12 bound volumes of Kings County Clerk's office bonds of administration, with registers of property transactions in the county. Each volume's entries span approximately 2 months, noting the principles, dates, and locations of each transaction. Each volume also contains an index of names.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Kings County Clerk bonds of administration, 1986.005, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
